short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your productivity with our AI-powered browser extension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ AIMagicText – Bring the power of AI to your browser! 🚀 Select any text on a webpage and let AI assist you with predefined or custom prompts to make your web experience smarter and more efficient.

🌟 Features:
🧠 Predefined AI Prompts: Easily apply prompts like summarization, translation, paraphrasing, or idea generation.
✏️ Customizable Prompts: Create and save your own unique prompts tailored to your needs.
🎯 Easy-to-Use Interface: Interact with selected text directly on the webpage—no interruptions!
⏳ Boost Productivity: Save time and effort by automating repetitive tasks or generating creative content effortlessly.
🌐 Versatile Applications: Perfect for professionals, students, writers, and anyone who works with text regularly.
🔒 Full Control: Decide how AI interacts with your selected text for results that match your expectations.
🌐 Visit aimagictext.in to explore more and get started!
